title: Cease Firing
description: CEASE FIRING is the epic saga of fearless men and passionate women caught up in the hellish war of a divided nation. Here is the powerful story of beautiful Désirée Gaillard and Edward Cary, a brave Confederate soldier. Edward goes off to fight heroically for the South he loves. Broken by the anguish of their separation, Désirée knows she must find him. Through burnt-out towns and bloody battlefields, despite danger and unspeakable hardship, Désirée finds that her passion is stronger than any fear--that her destiny lies with the man she loves.
author: Mary    Johnston
